snippet: Cate Blanchett will star with Isabelle Huppert in a new production of "The Maids" for Sydney Theater Company before she leaves her job as co-artistic director. Her husband, Andrew Upton, will stay on alone as artistic director for another term.
abstract: Cate Blanchett will star with Isabelle Huppert in a new production of "The Maids" for Sydney Theater Company before she leaves her job as co-artistic director. Her husband, Andrew Upton, will stay on alone as artistic director for another term.

headline.main: Before Blanchett Leaves Sydney Theater Post, Some Housekeeping
headline.print_headline: Blanchett and Huppert Play ‘The Maids’ in Sydney
